name: Saving the World from Slime
description:
A resource management idle game. Slimes have taken over the world. As one of the last remaining scientists, you decide to tackle the sticky situation with a fresh perspective.

Features:

  • Idle Game (Not a clicker Game)
  • Idle multiplier that increases profits based on how long you've been idle
  • Punishes the player for clicking by decreasing the idle multiplier
  • Auto saves every 5 minutes and on exiting the game (you can end the game with task manager to bypass the save)
  • Prestige system
  • Autobuyers
  • Pixel Graphics (made by myself and a friend)
  • No annoying music (or any other music)

Just a heads up, silly me forgot to add one of the functionalities to Capacitive Slimes. I recommend buying only a few of them because in the next update each one will reduce the amount of Energy you produce by a little bit.

I plan on releasing an update within 2 weeks of the previous update. I've got college and other responsibilities, so 2 weeks allow me time if my schedule becomes full. I will likely release updates more frequently than that.

Planned Features:

  • Slime Guide that explains the game and acts as a companion
  • More upgrades, unique slimes, buildings, research, and currencies.
  • Battle system with enemies.
  • Levels for unique slimes that unlock special abilities.
  • Downloadable saves for exporting and importing between devices. This will also help with bug reports.
  • Options including FPS, font size, and some colors.
  • Better implementation of offline progress so that it doesn't almost break the game.

The game will resize text and clickable elements to fit your screen, but ultra-wide or ultra-tall screens may pose problems. This was meant to be played on a wider-than-tall screen. I do not plan on releasing a separate build for phones, but I will modify the game's styles to be better for phone screens. I will also eventually release an HTML version that can be played on supported browsers, including those on phones.

If anything weird happens please let me know. I eliminated as many bugs as I could and added checks for parts of the game that could become problematic in extreme circumstances. There should be no bugs or glitches, but I expect that at least one got through. The best places to reach me are here and on my discord server dedicated to my indie games.

Controls

This game is free to download and play.

I hope you enjoy my game and thank you for playing!
